selected_quotes: Effect of 24 Sessions HIIT Carried out at Either High or Moderate Frequency, a Randomized Trial.
Nice study. I knew that last minute HIT was too little, too late too fatiguing.
24 intervallpass på 21 dagar försämrar lungkapacitet, slagvolym och VO2maxökning uteblir. 24 pass på 56 d är bättre. htt…
#HIIT 3 wks 8 times/wk, or 8 wks 3 times/wk: fatigue signs in high frequency training less adaptation #takeyourtime

citation.abstract: The training response of an intensified period of high-intensity exercise is not clear. Therefore, we compared the cardiovascular adaptations of completing 24 high-intensity aerobic interval training sessions carried out for either three or eight weeks, respectively.
citation.title: Effect of 24 Sessions of High-Intensity Aerobic Interval Training Carried out at Either High or Moderate Frequency, a Randomized Trial

news.summary: Several hard workouts in three weeks caused runners' fitness to decline.
